data.title: Home
data.text:
Principal's Desk

"At the outset, I extend my hearty welcome to all our faculty members, staff as well as the students who are joining our community for the first time. Biswanath College of Education is going to complete 32(Thirty Two) years ... of its glorious journey.I sincerely express my heartfelt gratitude to the honourable founder members of our institution for their vision and mission in establishing Biswanath College of Education. The foremost need for teacher training at the secondary level is to equipe teachers with effective pedagogical strategies tailored to adolescents learning style including differentiated instruction, classroom management techniques and assessment method that foster critical thinking and problem solving skills. Biswanath College of Education has been imparting B.Ed training since 1993 and D.El.Ed training since 2017 to a large number of would be teachers of Assam. Each and everyone of our family plays a vital role in shaping the mind and heart of our future educators. The success of the institution is the result of hardwork,dedication and passion of our faculty members. We are trying our best to uphold the standard of academic rigor, professional integrity and ethical conduct.We are responsible to nurture the community of life long learners who are dedicated to making a positive difference in the lives of others. As we embark on this journey together we must have to remember the profound impact that our work has on shaping the future of education. Let us take this opportunity to make a worthy and meaningful contribution to the filed of teacher education. I am happy with unwavering commitment and dedication of our family members and definitely we will achieve great things in the coming future. Thank you for your constant support and inspiration throughout my journey.
